content: this pattern is featured in the july 2021 issue of pattern pack pro this pattern is for a crochet bookmark made using a bruges lace crochet technique yarn crochet cotton thread size 10 finished size about 10 long skill level intermediate the pattern uses crochet us terms free version of this pattern is available on my website https //www goldenlucycrafts com/bookmark-crochet-pattern/ by purchasing this listing you will receive the pattern in a print-friendly styled and advertisement-free pdf file format product safety this is a virus free pdf it contains embedded links to reputable websites all links are to trusted sources but discretion is always advised when using links to external websites gpsr representative ciara doyle 6 killallon close c15 y5f9 ireland email ciara@thefairythorn ie
